data.name: Nightmare Hunter
data.detailed_description:
Start to the hunting Nightmare

Story about background

Nightmares keep invading.
The only way to stop them is to hold on until dawn!!

Feature
3 types of enemies
Chaser: They look like eyeballs, but if you touch them, they will chew you up.


Witness: They seem to be in place, but they come closer to you little by little.


Blind: For some reason, they're sealed, but they fire stingers in response to your gunfire.


4 types of items
Basic Guns: Only basic weapons have no time limit.
2 shots: You can get it randomly by killing the Chaser.
3 shots: The most useful weapon. It can be obtained randomly by defeating the Chaser.
Red Shell: A weapon obtained by defeating the Witness. Most powerful but slow compared to guns.
Shield: An item that can be obtained by defeating the Blind. Receives protection from enemies for a while.

Map
Space between reality and dream. You have to hold out until morning there. (99 seconds)

Survive nightmares for 99 seconds.


Coming soon.

data.short_description: Nightmare Hunter is an arcade game where you have to defeat the coming nightmares.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum screen resolution 1280x720
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: The more cores the better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: The more VRAM the better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
